rename_comp_bind₁:
theorem rename_comp_bind₁ {υ : Type _} (f : σ → mv_polynomial τ R) (g : τ → υ) :

  by
  ext1 i
  simp

rename_bind₁:
theorem rename_bind₁ {υ : Type _} (f : σ → mv_polynomial τ R) (g : τ → υ) (φ : mv_polynomial σ R) :
    rename g (bind₁ f φ) = bind₁ (fun i => rename g <| f i) φ :=
  alg_hom.congr_fun (rename_comp_bind₁ f g) φ

-- because we first need to show how these new definitions interact
-- and the proofs fall back on unfolding the definitions and call simp afterwards

theorem bind₁_X_right (f : σ → mv_polynomial τ R) (i : σ) : bind₁ f (X i) = f i :=
  aeval_X f i

aeval_comp_bind₁:
theorem aeval_comp_bind₁ [algebra R S] (f : τ → S) (g : σ → mv_polynomial τ R) :
    (aeval f).comp (bind₁ g) = aeval fun i => aeval f (g i) :=

aeval_bind₂:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr →+* » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr →ₐ[ ] » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr →+* » -/
theorem aeval_bind₂ [algebra S T] (f : σ → T) (g : «expr →+* » R (mv_polynomial σ S)) (φ : mv_polynomial σ R) :
    aeval f (bind₂ g φ) = eval₂_hom ((↑(aeval f : «expr →ₐ[ ] » _ S _) : «expr →+* » _ _).comp g) f φ :=
  eval₂_hom_bind₂ _ _ _ _
#align aeval_bind₂ aeval_bind₂
aeval_bind₁:
theorem aeval_bind₁ [algebra R S] (f : τ → S) (g : σ → mv_polynomial τ R) (φ : mv_polynomial σ R) :
    aeval f (bind₁ g φ) = aeval (fun i => aeval f (g i)) φ :=
  eval₂_hom_bind₁ _ _ _ _
#align aeval_bind₁ aeval_bind₁
